scripts.test: npm run lib && npm run lint && npm run mocha
scripts.browserify: ../node_modules/.bin/browserify lib/index.js -t babelify -t browserify-shim --standalone CycleMostAdapter --exclude most,most-subject --outfile dist/cycle-most-adapter.js
scripts.dist: npm run lib && npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.lib: rm -rf lib/ && mkdir -p lib/ && ../node_modules/.bin/typings install && tsc
scripts.prerelease: npm run doc && npm run dist
scripts.release-patch: npm version patch -m "chore(release): release new version" && npm run changelog
scripts.release-minor: npm version minor -m "chore(release): release new version" && npm run changelog
scripts.release-major: npm version major -m "chore(release): release new version" && npm run changelog
